payload.text:
# üöÄ NEXTRISE WEB AGENCY - ELITE WEBSITE BUILD PROMPT

## üéØ PROJECT MISSION
Create a high-converting, visually stunning website for NextRise Web Agency that turns visitors into paying clients. This is NOT a template site - this is a conversion-optimized machine built with exceptional design craft.

---

## üé® BRAND IDENTITY & VISUAL SYSTEM

### Color Palette (STRICT ADHERENCE)
```css
:root {
  /* Primary Colors */
  --neon-green: #00FF00;      /* Primary CTA, accents, highlights */
  --electric-green: #39FF14;   /* Hover states, glow effects */
  --lime-accent: #CCFF00;      /* Secondary accents */
  
  /* Neutrals */
  --pure-white: #FFFFFF;       /* Primary text, headings */
  --off-white: #F5F5F5;        /* Secondary text */
  --light-grey: #CCCCCC;       /* Tertiary text, borders */
  --medium-grey: #666666;      /* Muted elements */
  --dark-grey: #1A1A1A;        /* Card backgrounds */
  --pitch-black: #000000;      /* Main background */
  
  /* Gradients */
  --green-glow: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(0,255,0,0.15) 0%, rgba(0,255,0,0) 70%);
  --grid-overlay: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.02) 1px, transparent 1px),
                  linear-gradient(rgba(255,255,255,0.02) 1px, transparent 1px);
}
```

### Typography System
**Primary Font:** Monument Extended (or similar ultra-bold geometric sans) for headlines
- Alternatives: Clash Display, Satoshi, Archivo Black
- Weight: 700-900 for impact

**Secondary Font:** Space Grotesk or Clash Grotesk for body text
- Alternatives: Epilogue, Manrope, DM Sans
- Weight: 400-600

**Accent Font:** JetBrains Mono for technical elements, stats, numbers
- Creates tech credibility without being a coding site

```css
/* Typography Scale */
--text-xs: 0.75rem;
--text-sm: 0.875rem;
--text-base: 1rem;
--text-lg: 1.125rem;
--text-xl: 1.25rem;
--text-2xl: 1.5rem;
--text-3xl: 1.875rem;
--text-4xl: 2.25rem;
--text-5xl: 3rem;
--text-6xl: 3.75rem;
--text-7xl: 4.5rem;
--text-8xl: 6rem;
```

---

## üèóÔ∏è SITE STRUCTURE & FLOW

### Navigation
**Ultra-minimal floating nav:**
- Logo (left): "NEXTRISE" in Monument Extended
- Menu items (right): Work | Services | Process | Contact
- CTA button: "Get Started" (neon green with glow effect)
- Fixed position with blur backdrop
- Smooth color transitions on scroll

### Page Sections (IN THIS EXACT ORDER)

---

## 1Ô∏è‚É£ HERO SECTION - "The Showstopper"

**Visual Concept:** Full-viewport immersive experience with animated grid background

**Layout:**
```
[ANIMATED GRID BACKGROUND - SUBTLE GREEN GLOW AT INTERSECTIONS]

                    PRE-HEADLINE (Small, uppercase, tracked spacing)
                    WEBSITES THAT CONVERT
                    
                    MAIN HEADLINE (Massive, bold, white)
                    Turn Your Business Into a
                    Client-Booking Machine
                    
                    SUB-HEADLINE (Large, grey)
                    We design high-converting websites for serious businesses
                    that want more clients, more trust, and real growth ‚Äî
                    without tech headaches or guesswork.
                    
                    [PRIMARY CTA - NEON GREEN GLOW BUTTON]
                    Get My Website Built
                    
                    [SECONDARY TEXT - Small, grey]
                    Free strategy call ‚Ä¢ No pressure ‚Ä¢ Honest advice
                    
                    [SCROLL INDICATOR - Animated]
```

**Technical Specs:**
- Animated grid using CSS `background-image` with subtle parallax
- Green glow spots that slowly move (CSS animations)
- Text entrance: Staggered fade-up animation (0.1s delays)
- CTA button: Hover glow expansion, subtle pulse animation
- Cursor trail effect (optional, subtle green particles)

---

## 2Ô∏è‚É£ VIDEO SECTION - "Results Showcase"

**Layout:**
```
[FULL-WIDTH VIDEO PLAYER - DARK GREY BACKGROUND]

Video with custom controls (green accents)
Autoplay on scroll-into-view (muted, then unmuted on click)

Below video:
"See How This Works for My Business" [CTA button]
```

**Technical Specs:**
- Custom video player UI (green progress bar, white icons)
- Intersection Observer API for autoplay trigger
- Subtle border glow on hover

---

## 3Ô∏è‚É£ PROBLEM AWARENESS - "The Wake-Up Call"

**Visual Concept:** Split layout with dramatic contrast

**Layout:**
```
[LEFT SIDE - 50%]                    [RIGHT SIDE - 50%]
                                     
HEADLINE (Large, white)              [ANIMATED STATISTICS]
No Website =                         
Lost Clients You'll                  87% check websites before
Never Even Know About                buying anything
                                     ‚Üì
BODY COPY (Grey text)                64% won't trust a business
Right now, potential                 without a website
clients are searching...             ‚Üì
                                     Your competitors are
[PAIN POINTS - Checkmarks]           winning by default
‚úó You look less credible
‚úó You lose trust instantly           [VISUAL: Fading client icons]
‚úó You miss higher-value clients
‚úó You rely on referrals only
```

**Technical Specs:**
- Stats count-up animation on scroll
- Fading/disappearing client icon animation
- Red X marks with subtle pulse

---

## 4Ô∏è‚É£ SOLUTION SECTION - "How We Fix It"

**Layout:**
```
HEADLINE (Center, massive)
We Build Websites That Bring You Clients
‚Äî Not Just "Look Nice"

SUB-HEADLINE (Grey, center)
This isn't about design. It's about results.

[3-COLUMN GRID - FEATURE CARDS]

Card 1: 24/7 SALESPERSON      Card 2: INSTANT CREDIBILITY    Card 3: CLIENT MAGNET
[Icon]                         [Icon]                          [Icon]
Works while you sleep          Build trust in seconds          Clear path to booking

[Each card has dark grey background, green accent border on hover]

[LARGE CTA]
Build My Website the Right Way
```

**Technical Specs:**
- Cards with gradient borders that animate on hover
- Icon micro-animations (subtle bounce, rotate)
- Staggered card entrance animations

---

## 5Ô∏è‚É£ PROCESS SECTION - "How It Works"

**Visual Concept:** Horizontal timeline with connected dots

**Layout:**
```
HEADLINE (Center)
A Simple, Proven Process

[HORIZONTAL TIMELINE - Green line with numbered nodes]

    1                    2                         3
STRATEGY FIRST    CONVERSION-FOCUSED    LAUNCH & SUPPORT
                       DESIGN
    
[Each step expands on hover to show details]
```

**Technical Specs:**
- Animated line drawing effect on scroll
- Green glow pulses at each node
- Expanding cards on hover with smooth transitions

---

## 6Ô∏è‚É£ VIDEO TESTIMONIALS - "Social Proof"

**Layout:**
```
HEADLINE (Center, large)
What Business Owners Say After Working With Us

SUB-HEADLINE (Grey)
These aren't marketers. They're business owners who wanted
more clients ‚Äî and finally got a website that delivers.

[TESTIMONIAL VIDEO GRID - 2 videos visible, 1 below]

Video 1 (Larger)              Video 2 (Larger)
[Custom player]               [Custom player]

            Video 3 (Full width below)
            [Custom player]

[CTA]
I Want Results Like This
```

**Technical Specs:**
- Custom video thumbnails with play overlay
- Lightbox modal on click (full-screen video)
- Client name + business overlays

---

## 7Ô∏è‚É£ WRITTEN TESTIMONIALS - "Trust Building"

**Layout:**
```
[SCROLLING MARQUEE - INFINITE LOOP]

"Quote 1 - Client Name"  |  "Quote 2 - Client Name"  |  "Quote 3 - Client Name"  |  ...

[Duplicate set for seamless loop]
```

**Technical Specs:**
- CSS animation: `transform: translateX()`
- Pause on hover
- Green quote marks

---

## 8Ô∏è‚É£ SERVICES SECTION - "What You Get"

**Layout:**
```
HEADLINE
Everything You Need to Start Winning Clients Online

[4-CARD GRID - 2x2]

SERVICE 1                        SERVICE 2
Website Design & Development     Messaging & Copywriting
[Icon] [Description]             [Icon] [Description]

SERVICE 3                        SERVICE 4
Conversion Strategy              Ongoing Support
[Icon] [Description]             [Icon] [Description]

[Each card: Dark grey bg, green border glow on hover]
```

---

## 9Ô∏è‚É£ FAQ SECTION - "Objection Crusher"

**Layout:**
```
HEADLINE
"Is This Worth It for My Business?"

[ACCORDION STYLE - Expandable questions]

Q: Do I really need a website if I get referrals? [+]
Q: How long does it take? [+]
Q: What if I don't know what to say on the site? [+]
Q: Is this only for certain industries? [+]

[Green + icons, smooth expand/collapse animations]
```

---

## üîü FINAL CTA - "The Closer"

**Visual Concept:** Full-bleed immersive section with maximum urgency

**Layout:**
```
[FULL-VIEWPORT SECTION - GRADIENT BACKGROUND]

HEADLINE (Massive, center)
Your Future Clients Are Already Looking for You

SUB-HEADLINE (Large, grey)
The only question is whether they'll find you ‚Äî or your competitors.

[GIANT CTA BUTTON - GLOWING GREEN]
Book My Free Website Strategy Call

[Small trust line below]
No obligation ‚Ä¢ Honest advice ‚Ä¢ Clear next steps
```

---

## üé¨ ANIMATION & INTERACTION RULES

### Scroll Animations
1. **Fade-up entrances** for all section headlines (50px translate)
2. **Stagger delays** for multi-item sections (0.1s increments)
3. **Number count-ups** for statistics
4. **Progress bars** for skill/service indicators

### Hover States
1. **Buttons:** Scale 1.05, increase glow radius
2. **Cards:** Lift (translateY -10px), green border glow
3. **Links:** Underline slide-in animation
4. **Videos:** Play icon pulse, border glow

### Micro-interactions
1. **Cursor:** Custom cursor with green glow trail (optional)
2. **Magnetic buttons:** CTAs subtly follow cursor when nearby
3. **Parallax:** Grid background moves slower than content
4. **Smooth scroll:** Custom easing function for anchor links

---

## üíª TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS

### Performance
- Lazy load all videos and images below fold
- WebP format for images with fallbacks
- Minimize JavaScript (prefer CSS animations)
- < 3s page load time

### Responsive Breakpoints
```
Mobile: < 640px
Tablet: 640px - 1024px
Desktop: > 1024px
Large: > 1440px
```

### Frameworks/Libraries (Choose ONE)
**Option A:** Pure HTML/CSS/Vanilla JS
**Option B:** React + Framer Motion
**Option C:** Next.js + Tailwind CSS

### Must-Have Features
- Smooth scroll behavior
- Intersection Observer for scroll animations
- Form validation for contact forms
- Analytics tracking setup (Google Analytics)

---

## üìù COPY INTEGRATION

Use the provided content document EXACTLY for:
- Headlines
- Body copy
- CTAs
- FAQ answers
- Testimonial text (if not video)

**Tone:** Direct, confident, results-focused
**Voice:** No-BS, anti-corporate, human

---

## üö® CRITICAL "DON'T" LIST

‚ùå NO purple gradients
‚ùå NO Inter/Roboto/Arial fonts
‚ùå NO stock photos of people in suits
‚ùå NO "Contact Us" - say "Get Started" or "Book a Call"
‚ùå NO hamburger menu on desktop
‚ùå NO auto-playing videos with sound
‚ùå NO generic "Welcome to our website" language
‚ùå NO more than 3 fonts total
‚ùå NO centered walls of text over 3 lines

---

## ‚úÖ SUCCESS CRITERIA

The final website must:
1. ‚úÖ Load in under 3 seconds
2. ‚úÖ Make the CTA visible within 1 screen view at ALL times
3. ‚úÖ Feel premium, modern, and trustworthy
4. ‚úÖ Work perfectly on mobile (60%+ of traffic)
5. ‚úÖ Guide visitors toward ONE action: booking a call
6. ‚úÖ Stand out from 99% of agency websites

---

## üéØ FINAL GUIDANCE FOR AI

This is a **conversion-focused weapon**, not a portfolio piece. Every pixel should guide visitors toward booking a call. The design should make competitors look outdated. The copy should make the decision feel obvious.

Think: Apple's boldness + Stripe's clarity + Webflow's modernity.

Build something that makes the client say: "Holy shit, THIS is what I need."

---

**Now build it. No excuses. No generic outputs. Make it legendary.**

**Defining Brand Identity**

I'm focused on establishing a strong brand identity for "NextRise Web Agency." This involves defining their visual style, including typography and color palette, to ensure a cohesive and impactful landing page. I'm aiming for a look that's both high-converting and visually appealing.


**Refining Visual Style**

I've been iterating on the visual elements. I've chosen a neon-centric color palette, including various shades of green, white, and grey, along with a pitch-black option for a dark mode. Gradients and overlays will add depth. I am now looking at the typography, focusing on a primary font (Monument Extended), secondary font (Space Grotesk), and an accent font (JetBrains Mono).

Main Application component that orchestrates all sections.
Problem Awareness section with split layout and stats.

payload.text:
**Refining Web Typography**

I'm currently focused on the typography and spacing issues on the "NextRise Web Agency" website. The feedback highlighted oversized text and excessive spacing, which I'm addressing by implementing a global typography scale and reducing font sizes. This should lead to a more refined and readable design.


**Implementing Global Style Adjustments**

I've been meticulously updating the CSS variables for typography and spacing, focusing on a more global approach. I've updated the `body` font size and line height, and am making consistent adjustments across all sections, as per the detailed prompt. I'm aiming for a uniform and refined feel. Specifically, I've started reducing sizes and spacing in `Hero.tsx`, and I am working methodically down the list. I am targeting consistent reductions for padding, grid gaps and various typographic elements. I've set the Headline in Hero to 56px, as a test.


**Applying Specific Type Scales**

I'm now diving into the component files. I am meticulously applying the new type scale. I've started by updating the root CSS variables in `index.html`. Then, I moved to `Hero.tsx`, where I've adjusted the headline and sub-headline sizes, as per the new guidelines and reduced the vertical padding.

entries.description: Update global CSS variables for typography and spacing scale to create a more refined, professional appearance.
Significantly reduce hero headline and sub-headline sizes, and adjust layout spacing.
Adjust video section headline and CTA sizing.
Reduce problem section headline, text, and statistics sizing.
